A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

GM8_sprout.changelog:
Switched to libperfmgr for better performance, battery and less heating.
Some stability improvements.

X00T.changelog:
- CLEAN FLASH REQUIRED (If you are coming from build with 4.4 kernel, i.e: before 09.04.2021 build) 

- Updated blobs from LA.UM.9.6.2.r1-04100-89xx.0
- Updated drm widevine to 1.3

X01AD.changelog:
- Update Security Patch
- Update stormbreaker kernel

alioth.changelog:
- Enable LLVM tools flag, build with ld.lld
- parts: Import RU translations
- overlay: Define OEM fast charge sysfs node
- Update some blobs to CAF LA.UM.9.12.r1-12000-SMxx50.0:
ADSP, CDSP, CNE, Configstore, Display Postprocessing, DPM, DSP service, ESE, FEC, Graphics (Adreno and Vulkan)
Media, Neural Networks, Peripheral manager, QCC, QMI, QTEE Connector, RIL, RIL (IMS), SCVE, Time, TUI, WFD
- Build GNSS HAL from source and update GPS blobs to LA.UM.9.12.r1-12000-SMxx50.0
- Update Camera and Sensor blobs to MIUI 21.8.18 Weekly
- Import missed mi_thermald blobs (fix overheating)
- Remove unused firmware bins
- Import qti telephony injection
- Cleanup init scripts
- Add Notch Bar Killer overlay
- Build mock power stats HAL and label it
- Kernel: Build with LLD, RELR, Clang ThinLTO optimizations
- Kernel: Disable some unuse drivers
- Kernel: Enable jump label
- Kernel: Makefile: Use -O3 optimization level
- Kernel: Enable power efficient workqueues
- Kernel: Re-enable qti core control and sched autogroup
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Installation instruction: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-11-0-0-alioth-aliothin-arrowos-11-0-official-weekly.4279481/post-85045261

apollo.changelog:
***Encryption has changed - format data when installing this build*** (FDE does not work)
- Switch to AES-256-XTS encryption
- Switch to QTI Bluetooth (thanks krasCGQ)
- Aptx adaptive & TWS working
- Enable dex2oat64
- Set dexpreopt to work as default android recommends
- Bump mic gain for video recording (gcam working)
- Enable QTI codec2 (thanks krasCGQ)
- Enable some wifi power savings
- Define stock charger sysfs node (all kernels will display fast charging with 33w charger)
- Move parts to system_ext
- Enable idle timer with kernel support
- Uprev Keymaster to 4.1 (thx krasCGQ)
- Fixed VoIP call sound issues
- Add libpermgr init by Ramii (better perf + battery)
- Update blobs from BSP

***Encryption has changed - format data when installing this build*** I will not warn again.

Use Arrow Recovery for best experience. Find in the below groups:

XDA: https://forum.xda-developers.com/t/rom-official-11-arrowos-vanilla-gapps-aosp.4251089/
Telegram: https://t.me/arrowapolloofficial

beryllium.changelog:
- sdm845-common:
Update blobs to MIUI polaris V12.5.1.0.QDGCNXM
- beryllium: Update blobs from V12.0.3.0.QEJMIXM
- Update display and adreno blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update WFD blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update OMX codecs and VPP to OnePlus6 R
- Update Configstore blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update Power-off alarm blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update ESE, PerMgr and Time services blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Update IRQ balance blobs to OnePlus6 R
- Fixed Smart Charging permissions and sepolicy
- Kernel: Merge android-4.9-q google kernel common (4.9.277)
- Kernel: Merge CAF tag LA.UM.9.3.r1-02800-sdm845.0

Note:

cas.changelog:
Firmware: V12.5.5.0.RJJCNXM
Fixed:
1.Fod in low brightness

cepheus.changelog:
Kernel changes:
• Upstreamed to .232
• Merge latest CAF tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
• Merge WireGuard v1.0.20210424
• Improve low memory killer
• Mirco-optimize scheduler
• Drop unused NUMA feature(Non-Uniform Memory Access)
• Bring back userspace boost method
• Add some thermal zones for mi_thermald
• Enable Ftrace for iorap perfetto

Device specific changes:
• Update prebuilt firmware and blobs from cepheus-user 11 RKQ1.200826.002 21.4.7 release-keys
• Switch to POCO X3 Pro Global Listen stack and hotwordenrollment blobs (fixes screen off Google hotword detection and low mic volume when enabled OK Google)
• Add proper configs for burn-in protection
• Drop non-functional power off alarm blobs
• Reset to miui stock audio configs
• Cleanup SEPolicy rules also resolve all neverallow rues
• Disable GPU Boost during interaction powerhint
• Fix camera stutter in some apps
• Enable iorap readahead (Improve app startup time)
• Enable unspecialized app process pool
• Use Gcam Go only with gapped releases (use snap with vanila releases)
• Update to June redfin fingerprint 
• Flatten APEXs for performance
• Make the UI smoother
• Use "Xiaomi Mi 9" for default ssid name 
• Some stuff else, go read commit list on Github.

cheeseburger.changelog:
- Fixed Smart Charging sepolicy and permissions
- Sepolicy: Address more denials
- Doze: Improve support for AOD
- fstab: Disable force encryption for f2fs
- Update Media blobs from LA.UM.9.2.r1-01800-SDMxx0.0
- Update WFD blobs from phoenix_sprout 11 RKQ1.201123.002
- Fixes for WFD (maybe will work)
- Inlined Camera DotFix (v6.0)
- Fixes sepolicy and permissions for vibration strength into OnePlus settings
- Drop all SF offset related props
- Disable surfaceflinger backpressure
- pocketmode: Rework
- Add dummy libqti-perfd-client
- Kernel: Enable support NTFS
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

cmi.changelog:
! ! ! Firmware and vendor require update to V12.2.4.0.RJACNXM.

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

davinci.changelog:
10/07/2021
- Fixed the fingerprint dialog
- Disabled the SIM is HD capable notification
- Enabled ambient display settings

20/06/2021
- Rebased the device sources
- Switched to the Qualcomm Power HAL
- Switched to a different screen off fod implementation

22/05/2021
- Improved power consumption
- Switched to VantomKernel

11/05/2021
- Updated blobs from MIUI 21.4.28

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

sweet.changelog:
For installation information, refer to https://telegra.ph/Installation-of-ArrowOS-sweetsweetin---included-vendor-05-10

30/08/2021
• Fixed oversaturated colors
• Reworked color modes
• Improved idle drain

20/08/2021
• Moved refresh rate settings to the device specific settings again
• Removed KCAL color adjustment
• Added back AOSP color modes settings
• Enabled RGB color adjustment
• Switched to OSS GPS/GNSS stack
• Switched bootanimation resource to 1080
• Disabled proximity check on pulse

15/08/2021
• Removed more unused files and services in the vendor
• Solved batterysecret denials (fast charging should work better now)
• Dropped QTI perfd (improved device temperatures)
• Enabled burn-in protection on the navigation bar and status bar
• Added russian translations to the device specific settings
